Remove disputed tag. You need to outline exactly which facts are in dispute..on the talk page.
Removed TotallyDisputed template. You need to follow the process at [[Wikipedia:Accuracy dispute]]
removed false claims about the "6 million" - if 6 million jews DID die we wouldn't have the problems we have in the world today
read the talk page for new citations and quotes on targeting of poles (Holocaust controversy topic). only "miltiary exigency" prevented larger scale extermination.
rv to last edit by Jayjg; see talk
rv of rv:In talk page, there is no one that disputes the rhetoric that is quoted against Poles. Lang clearly picks out Poles as target of genocide. Jayjg: Did you read links?
getting agreement in Talk: doesn't mean posting something, then doing it. Get agreement.
As per talk page, Poles moved to the targeted genocide list, edit to statement re "little evidence"--at the very least, sheer numbers show some evidence of targeting, though not same as jews/poles
rv:perhaps when you get consensus on the Talk: page for this change, and there's a decent article to link to. In any event, the debate about numbers does not belong in the header.
rv back with some edits bc 1) the lens for the reader should be focused prior to reading 2) the article clearly states holocaust denial is NOT revisionism in true form though they wish they were
There is no difference between "revisionism" and "denial", as the talk page there shows, and Holocaust denial is linked to this article, it doesn't need to be in the header.
Seems to be a more palatable edit. Holocaust Denial link should be preserved in the interest of diversity of points of view but it should be noted it is a very extreme position
rv - the line reverted away was, if not vandalism, unnecessarily misleading
